typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sr_no as integer,
		employee_first_name as string,
		employee_last_name as string,
		age as integer,
		school as string,
		college as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 filter(sr_no > 0) ~> Filter1
